title: Tencent AI Veteran Snags Funds for Year-Old Rival to OpenAI Sora
description: The scientist who oversaw development of Tencent Holdings Ltd.’s flagship AI model has raised $50 million with a startup planning to release a rival to OpenAI’s Sora, the latest high-profile entry in one of the more profitable of artificial intelligence spheres.

title: Perplexity shopping bot not welcome at Amazon shop
description: Amazon is demanding that artificial intelligence startup Perplexity put a stop to its bot shopping for people at the e-commerce giant's retail platform, the companies said on Tuesday.
content:
Amazon is demanding that artificial intelligence startup Perplexity put a stop to its bot shopping for people at the e-commerce giant's retail platform, the companies said on Tuesday.

title: VIEW Asian markets post sharpest selloff in seven months as AI rally pauses

title: Tesla is obsessed with Musk’s pay package. Musk is obsessed with AI.
description: Musk’s focus on winning the artificial-intelligence arms race leads to long hours at xAI. Employees were compelled to turn over biometric data to develop controversial avatars.

title: US stock markets fall after Goldman, Morgan Stanley heads flag overvalued equities
description: All three major U.S. stock indexes slid well into negative territory after the CEOs of Morgan Stanley and Goldman Sachs stoked fears of a potential market bubble, with the S&P 500 having climbed to a series of all-time highs, largely powered by the artificial intelligence boom.
